ai-patthana23.5:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana23.5:0.3_0: Talking for oneself, looking for thoughts.
ai-patthana23.5:1.1_0: Not applied and sustained thought does not arise when it comes to the mind. Mindfulness arises dependent on the teaching and training. Grounded on a cause and reason.
ai-patthana23.5:2.1_0: Not applied and sustained thought does not arise when it comes to the mind. Mindfulness arises dependent on the teaching and training. Grounded on the cause or condition.
ai-patthana23.5:3.1_0: Unskillful thoughts don’t give rise to placing the mind and keeping it connected. Mindfulness arises dependent on the teaching and training.
ai-patthana23.5:3.1_1: (They are) causes and reasons for twelve reasons.
ai-patthana23.5:3.1_2: The group of twelve on non-violent speech
